amendment.description: An amendment to increase funds for the Department-Wide Programs (Indian Affairs) by $52,000,000. And, to reduce funds for the National Endowment for the Arts by $160,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Department-Wide Programs (Indian Affairs) by $52,000,000. And, to reduce funds for the National Endowment for the Arts by $160,000,000.

action.text: Mr. Dicks raised a point of order against the Lamborn amendment (A010). The Chair sustained the point of order.
